content:
# I have successfully moved to the adjusted position for harvesting stone. 
# Now, I will attempt to harvest stone from this location once more.

# Attempting to harvest a quantity of 20 stone from the adjusted position.
harvested_stone = harvest_resource(new_stone_position, quantity=20)
print(f'Harvested {harvested_stone} stone from the patch.')

# After harvesting the stone, I will check my inventory to confirm the update.
print(f"Updated inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")
